name: jgroups-raft
tagline: Implementation of the Raft consensus protocol in JGroups
body:
### Welcome to jgroups-raft
The jgroups-raft project is a Raft implementation in [JGroups](http://www.jgroups.org). It is currently in its own repo because it'll move much faster than JGroups and I wanted to have the freedom to release versions in rapid succession.


### Documentation
Working on it...

### Javadoc
TBA
